alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 8:43PM EST until March 07 at 9:15PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Bennington County in southern Vermont... Windham County in southern Vermont... * Until 915 PM EST. * At 843 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Wardsboro, or over Stratton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Bellows Falls, Townshend, Manchester, Stratton, Putney, Vernon, Wilmington, Readsboro, Saxtons River, Westminster, Newfane, Guilford Center, West Wardsboro, Manchester Center, Windham, Rockingham, Guilford, Whitingham and Dover. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
